name: preferio
description: Preferio - Full-stack application with Vite React, Next.js, and Python FastAPI

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:nextjs" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:nextjs
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../nextjs-app && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:nextjs" "npm run start:backend"
